# GSL Elevation {#elev-analyses}

```{r, elev-plot}
elevation=merge(elevation, site_list, by.x="site_no", by.y="SiteNumber", all.x=T)

elev_plot=
	plot_ly(elevation, x=~Date) %>%
		add_lines(y=~elev_ft, x=~Date, name=~Bay) %>%
		layout(title = "GSL Water surface elevation",
			xaxis = list(title = ""),
			yaxis = list(side = 'left', title = 'Elevation (ft)')
		) %>% 
		config(displaylogo = FALSE, collaborate = FALSE,
			modeBarButtonsToRemove = c(
				'sendDataToCloud',
				'hoverClosestCartesian',
				'hoverCompareCartesian',
				'lasso2d',
				'select2d'
			)
		)
elev_plot
```
